channel.title: How do i change the combat level?
channel.description:
I forgot how to lol.
If some1 can tell me i can make u mod on my new server :D

item.title: How do i change the combat level?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“squal707, post:2, topic:362640”]in character files

character-skill = 0 lvl xp

you can set all skills at 99 with 0 xp it will be 99/1 wich will let you wear stuff at 3 combat[/quote]

I think he’s asking how he would change the max combat level…Go into your client.java and search return 99; or whatever your max skill level is.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the combat level?
